#How to install JournlerWeb

JournlerWeb is not ready for prime time. Installation requires manual steps and the usage of SVN.  I hope to have an easier way to install soon.

= Requirements =

For now, you have to install these separately but it shouldn't bee too difficult to make a single installer in the future. 

  # Install MacPython 2.4 from [http://www.pythonmac.org/packages/py24-fat/dmg/python-2.4.4-macosx2006-10-18.dmg here]
    * check which version you currently have with 'python -V'
  # Install appscript from [http://sourceforge.net/project/downloading.php?groupname=appscript&filename=Appscript-Installer-1.5.1.dmg here]
  # Install Turbogears from [http://www.turbogears.com/download/ here]
  # Install Subversion (svn) from [http://metissian.com/downloads/macosx/subversion/subversion-client-1.3.1.dmg here]

= Install JournlerWeb = 
 
Currently, you have to install JournlerWeb from svn.
